 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּרָא‎</span>] **verb Ithpe\`el** ==be distressed== (compare <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּרְיָא‎</span> III. adjective ***suffering***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּ רִיוּחָא‎</span> noun ***id.*** [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>WB 197</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be short, abridged***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***it grieved me***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pain, grief***; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kûru***</u></abbr>, ***pain***; also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (derived species) ***be ill***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dislike, shrink from***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִתְכְּכְּ רִיַת רוּחִי‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 47. Beisp. 2</sup>) Dn<sup>15</sup>.
